text: Getty GLOBE's outrageous report comes as relations in the royal family are tense, with the question as to who will succeed Queen Elizabeth to the throne playing on their minds. Reportedly, Charles has become furious with Kate Middleton's parents Michael and Carole Middleton for putting'nonsense'in his son's head when it comes to raising his children.'The truth is Carole is a caring and devoted mother to Kate,'an insider scandalously spilled to the publication.'Kate depends on her for help and advice - not Charles, who is awkward, or Camilla, who would rather drink wine.'The claims continue, with GLOBE stating Prince Charles has insisted he should final say in how the royal babies are brought up - including George, 4, and Charlotte, 3.'The family
